channel.title: Help? How to add Models, need help!
channel.description: Yea... I found a topic on Guthix Godsword, I added everything, then I spawn it ingame, i right click it, it says Guthix Godsword, but it looks like a null and I can't equipt it. Help?

item.title: Help? How to add Models, need help!
item.dc:creator: @Surfr Surfr
item.description:
@Surfr wrote:

Guthix god sword is terrible, all the PRI is set wrong so you see your body through the sword etc.

Basically, make your model, copy it and put it on the floor as the drop model.

Convert it and add animation with DATmaker. Or if your trying to animate a platebody/arms or legs in your model editor create a file with custom anim data, VSKIN, TSKIN1 and PRI, add weights obv.

Make your .dat file into a packed .gz file add into your client model directory.

Write your INTS, rotate the image in your invent screen etc.

Add the item ID to all your item ID’s.

Add weapon animation if your making a weapon, server side.

And your done, I’ve probably left something out but IDC, visit the model section for more info. Theres probs a tutorial sticked.

Read full topic
item.source: Help? How to add Models, need help!
